title.en: Maburaho VS Slayers!? - Dragon All Stars Gekitou-hen

altTitles.en: Maburaho vs Slayers!! Dragon All Stars
まぶらほＶＳスレイヤーズ！？　ドラゴン☆オールスターズ激闘編

description.en:
Dragon Age Crossover Special  
 **Authors:**||1- Dragon All Stars ~One-way trip  
**Drawing:**  Furuno Fujou  
2- Slayers ~How we are~  
**Drawing:**  Kiyono Shimanda  
**Script:**  Hajime Kanzaka  
**Character design:**  Rui Arazumi  
3- Maburaho  
**Drawing:**  Chako Abeno  
**Screenplay/character design:**  Eiji Komatsu  
4- Chrno Crusade ~Fortunate~  
**Drawing:**  Yuki Kiriga  
 **Script/Character Design:**  Moriyama Daisuke  
5- Fullmetal Panic! ~Tessa-chan with 9 years~  
**Drawing:**  Tomoshiro Nagai  
**Script:** Shouji Gatou **Character design:**  Shikidouji   
6 - Mahou Senshi Louie ~Don't treat me badly! ~  
**Drawing:**  Masaki Sanada   
**Script:**  Ryou Mizumi **Character design:**  Mamoru Yokata   
7 - Scrapped Princess.  
**Drawing:**  Naomi Ayase  
**Script:**  Ichiro Sasaki **Character design:**  Yukinobu Asami   
8 - Majutsuhi Orphen ~Happy Birthday~  
**Drawing:**  Yuki Kiriga  
**Script:**  Yoshinobu Akita **Character design:**  Yuuya Kusaka  
9 - Chrno Crusade ~Noisy Party~  
**Drawing:**  Kiyono Shimanda  
**Script / Character design:**  Moriyama Daisuke   
10 -Fullmetal Panic! ~Every day war~  
**Drawing:**  Jun Fujishima  
**Script/character design:**  Shikidouji  
11 - Maburaho  
**Drawing:**  Naomi Ayase  
**Script:**  Toshihiro Tsukiji **Character design:**  Eiji Komatsu  
12 - Scrapped Princess ~Melancholy~  
**Drawing:**  Sumihei  
**Script:**  Ichiro Sasaki **Character design:**  Yukinobu Asami  
13 - Chrno Crusade ~Untitled~  
**Drawing:**  Yoshina Fukuyama  
 **Script/Character Design:**  Moriyama Daisuke  
14 - Chrno Crusade  
**Drawing:**  Nyoriko Yamada  
 **Script/Character Design:**  Moriyama Daisuke  
15 - Dragon All Stars ~Travel back~  
 **Drawing:**  Yukikaze Amagi||

description.pt-br: Maburaho VS Slayers?! é um especial da Comic Dragon, onde vários personagens de algumas de suas séries se encontram e interagem. Baseado no jogo de cartas “Dragon All Stars”, de cada título. Neste especial poderemos ver como personagens de 7 mangás distintos competem em uma corrida dimensional.
